mcq.statement: If I bee you, I would no do that. If I am you, I would no do that. If I were you, I would no do thatChoose the sentence with the correct use of subjunctive mood?

options.a: If I bee you, I would no do that.
options.b: If I am you, I would no do that.
options.c: If I were you, I would no do that.
